overview_of_class: This course addresses the role that social factors play in in the development of sociological perspectives and schools of thought. Attention will focus on the role of race, gender and power in the rise of American sociology. The case of W. E. B. Du Bois will be highlighted to shed light on the origins and development of American sociology.
name: Topics in Sociological Analysis
topic: Race, Gender, Du Bois and Sociological Theory
subject: SOCIOL
